game.name: S.A.F.E
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, 협동, 온라인 협동, 색상 대체, 음량 개별 조정, 키보드 전용 옵션, 스테레오 사운드, 서라운드 사운드, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: S.A.F.E is a co-op survival horror game where you and your friends must go into castles and dungeons to find souls for the monster to eat. There will be consequences is the monster is not fed! The game includes many different maps and tons of monsters to keep you and your friends on your heels.
game.shortDescriptionEn: S.A.F.E is a co-op survival horror game where you and your friends must go into castles and dungeons to find souls for the monster to eat. There will be consequences is the monster is not fed! The game includes many different maps and tons of monsters to keep you and your friends on your heels.
